2014-03-20-drawing-progress-mashup-time.title: Drawing in Progress: Mashup time!
2014-03-20-drawing-progress-mashup-time.author: admin
2014-03-20-drawing-progress-mashup-time.__content:
As a big fan of T-shirt designs on Teefury and all the mashups between different IPs (games, movies, TV shows, etc), I got my very own idea for a mashup! It is something I would love to make into a T-shirt design and submit it to Teefury or Threadless or what have you. Here's a bit of a teaser ;)

Working on a new sketch! #illustration #mashup. More updates coming later!

— Cryptacular (@Cryptacular) March 18, 2014

Keep an eye on my Twitter feed for more updates.
